bills.title: Resolution urging President Trump and Governor Walz to pardon Derek Chauvin
Joint resolution acknowledging that Christ is King
Revise laws relating to interim committees
Permitting reimbursements to all individuals for receipts of costs incurred related to the hunting or trapping of wolves for all lawfully harvested wolves
Revise election laws to require certain local elections to take place in even-numbered years
Creating open wolf hunting season until the population is at or below a certain number
Reduce the number of associate judges on the Supreme Court
Revise statewide ballot issue laws
Generally revise campaign finance laws to increase transparency
Revise laws for approval of bond elections and mill levy elections
Require candidates for office to disclose foreign citizenship
Provide that local government elections be partisan
Prohibit adding fluoride to public water supply systems
Prohibit employing aliens not lawfully authorized to accept employment
Provide for a birth day tax credit for the birth of a child
Require ballot issue signature gatherers to be Montana citizens and registered voters
Changing the date of the primary election to the third Tuesday in May
Require that individuals may not be a precinct committee representative of more than one political party
Revise parenting laws involving the best interest of a child who is transitioning genders
Revise laws related to firearms, ammunition, and accessories
Prohibit dispensing of menstrual products in school male-designated restrooms
Partisan election of supreme court candidates
Prohibit access to child pornography in Montana
Require human sexuality instruction in public schools to include image of D&E abortion at certain gestational age
Revise laws related to child abuse and neglect
Prohibit ownership of private property within state by certain foreign individuals and entities
Provide income tax credit for certain long-time residents
Create judicial branch independence investigation committee
Provide income tax credit for firearm suppressors
Reduce supreme court budget
Provide exclusion from income for certain income from sale of a newly constructed residence
Prohibit harboring or assisting illegal aliens
Provide for class of property for manufacturing for property tax purposes
Generally revise laws related to illegal aliens
